title.first: The CROUS menu in one click

HomePage.subtitle: CROUStillant allows you to consult the menus of CROUS de France and overseas restaurants.

card1.title: Search by region, city or restaurant
card1.description: Easily access your restaurant thanks to our search function

card2.title: Opening and closing hours
card2.description: Consult your CROUS university restaurant schedules quickly.

card3.title: Contacts and accepted payer
card3.description: Discover the means of payment accepted in your university restaurant.

card4.title: Access to all restaurants
card4.description: CROUStillant offers you a complete selection of Crous restaurants.

footer.title: Convinced ?
footer.subtitle: Start your use of CROUStillant now!

RadarsCard.title: Created by students, for students
RadarsCard.subtitle: CROUStillant is a project which aims to provide information on the menus of university restaurants in France and overseas.

GitCard.subtitle: CROUStillant is a constantly evolving project. We are always looking for new talents to join the team and help us improve the service.

ApiCard.subtitle: Integrate CROUStillant information into your own application for free using our API.

RestaurantCard.accessibility: Accessibility for people with reduced mobility

presentation.title: Made by students, for students...
presentation.description: CROUStillant is a project that aims to provide information on the menus of university restaurants in France and overseas.

updates.title: Hot dishes, always.
updates.description: CROUStillant scans the entire menus of CROUS restaurants several times a day to provide you with always up-to-date and reliable information.

open-source.title: Free & 100% open-source!
open-source.description: CROUStillant is an entirely open-source and free project. You can view the project's source code on GitHub and contribute to its development if you wish.

job.title: Join the team!
job.description: CROUStillant is a constantly evolving project. We are always looking for new talents to join the team and help us improve the service.

product.title: Simple, intuitive and accessible
product.description: CROUStillant is a simple and intuitive platform that allows you to access the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas. The platform is accessible to all and does not require any registration.

features.feature2: Search by region, city or establishment

team.title: The team
team.description: The CROUStillant team is made up of passionate volunteers. We work together to make the information of CROUS restaurants more accessible and readable.

discord.title: Available on Discord
discord.description: Add our official Discord bot to your server to check the menus of CROUS restaurants directly on Discord!

integrated.title: Integrate CROUS data
integrated.description: You can integrate CROUS data directly into your own projects using our API. The API is free and open-source.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: CROUStillant uses data provided by the official CROUS website, which is aggregated and updated several times a day, then made accessible via our API. The CROUStillant API is available on the official French government data site.

convinced.title: Convinced?
convinced.description: Discover the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas with CROUStillant!

more-convinced.title: Even more convinced?
more-convinced.description: Join our Discord server to chat with other users and the CROUStillant team!

seo.title: About
seo.description: Discover the CROUStillant project, its team and its operation. Learn more about the platform and its features.

LegalPage.title: Legal notices
LegalPage.subtitle: Updated the 31st of December 2024
LegalPage.description: Find all the legal information about CROUStillant and its operation.

part1.title: Site identification
part1.content1: The site: https://croustillant.menu is the official site of CROUStillant.
part1.content2: CROUStillant is an open-source project that aims to provide information on the menus of university restaurants in France and overseas.

part2.title: Editor
part2.content1: The site is edited by CROUStillant D√©veloppement.
part2.content2: CROUStillant is a non profit project and is not affiliated with the "CROUS" or any other similar organization.

part3.title: Property
part3.content1: The site is the property of CROUStillant D√©veloppement.
part3.content2: However, the data displayed on the site belongs to the "CROUS" and the respective restaurants.

part4.title: Development
part4.content1: The site was designed and developed by the CROUStillant D√©veloppement team. The team is made up of passionate volunteers: Paul Bayfield (founder and lead developer), Adlen Cherif (UI designer and web developer) and Lucas Debeve (database designer).
part4.content2: The site was designed to be simple, intuitive and accessible to all. It is entirely open-source and free.

part5.title: Hosting
part5.content1: The site is hosted by the CROUStillant D√©veloppement team, on Paul Bayfield's personal server.
part5.content2: The site is hosted in France, on a secure and reliable server. No personal data is collected or stored on the server.

part1.title: Personal data
part1.content1: This site does not collect any personal data about users.
part1.content2: CROUStillant D√©veloppement does not collect any personal data about users of the site. No data is stored or shared with third parties.

part2.title: Data processed
part2.content1: This site processes only the data necessary for the proper functioning of the service.
part2.content2: The personal data that may be collected on the site, if any, by: the forms, the connection to the site (IP address, browser, operating system). When certain information is mandatory to access specific features of the site, this mandatory nature is indicated at the time of data entry. If you refuse to provide mandatory information, you may not have access to certain services or features of the site.

part3.title: Data retention
part3.content1: CROUStillant D√©veloppement does not transfer data outside the European Union.
part3.content2: All data is stored in France, on a secure and reliable server.

part1.title: Cookie usage
part1.content1: The site uses only cookies necessary for the proper functioning of the service.
part1.content2: The site uses cookies to improve the user experience and ensure the proper functioning of the service. No advertising or tracking cookies are used on the site.

part2.title: Cookie management
part2.content1: You can manage cookies by changing your browser settings.
part2.content2: You can also delete cookies at any time using the site settings.

part1.title: Acceptance of the terms
part1.content1: By accessing the site, you agree to the terms of use.
part1.content2: If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the site.

part2.title: Modification of the terms
part2.content1: The terms of use may be modified at any time.
part2.content2: Users will be informed of any changes to the terms of use.

part3.title: Intellectual property
part3.content1: The content of this site may not be reproduced or used for commercial or advertising purposes.
part3.content2: The information used should only be used for personal, associative or professional purposes. Any dissemination or use for commercial or advertising purposes is excluded.

part4.title: Provenance
part4.content1: No page may be presented as originating from this site if transformations have been made to change its meaning.
part4.content2: The photos from the housing offers from the owners are not contractual and in no way engage the responsibility of CROUStillant D√©veloppement.

part5.title: Links
part5.content1: The site may contain links to other sites.
part5.content2: CROUStillant D√©veloppement is not responsible for the content of external sites. CROUStillant D√©veloppement cannot be held responsible for any damage caused by the use of these sites.

seo.title: Legal notices
seo.description: Find all the legal information about CROUStillant and its operation. Discover the terms of use, privacy policy and cookie policy.
